Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic administrative text. Writing on recto only, in two directions: 3 lines along the fibres and 2 lines across them. Thompson's MS Catalogue (numbered as 10118 A): "in one corner "128"; on opposite margin "Salt 1821" [...] Apparently memoranda of accounts [...] Date. Persian. prob. Darius. Origin. uncertain".
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381215) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381215)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
